items.name: animated-pill-tabs
items.title: Animated Pill Tabs
items.description: Animated pill navigation paired with a blur-fade content stage so you can tell long-form product stories without switching sections.

docs.overview: Animated pill navigation with blur-fade content transitions. Perfect for cinematic storytelling and narrative-heavy launches. Features springy pill animation, shared layoutId, and blur-in copy effects.
docs.craftStory: I saw a hero section on Doppler.com that stacked headline, stats, and integrations onto one cinematic surface, so I re-created the interaction with a springy pill, shared layoutId, blur-in copy, and a generous content stage tuned for narrative-heavy launches.
installation: This component is already available in your project.
whereToCreate: Create the following file in your project:

tabs.type: Array<{ label: string, title: string, content: ReactNode }>
tabs.description: Array of tab objects. Each tab has a label (for the pill button), title (optional heading), and content (any React node).

containerClassName.description: Custom classes for the outer section. Perfect for width constraints, background treatments, or responsive padding tweaks.

tabClassName.description: Shared classes for each tab button. Useful for typography, casing, spacing, or setting up your own hover states.

activeTabClassName.description: Classes applied to the animated pill highlight. Combine with borders, gradients, or shadows to match your brand.

contentClassName.description: Classes for the content surface. Use it to set min-heights, glassmorphism, borders, or layout primitives.

features: Springy pill animation with shared layoutId
